tool_description: Navigate the anime universe like a pro with our Anime Atlas Go API, offering a treasure trove of 45k+ titles! Find your favorites by user rating, search by anime title, sort by genre, and enjoy seamless pagination for an epic anime discovery journey.
name: AnimeAtlas
title: AnimeAtlas

api_list.name: Get Anime by Genre
api_list.description: get all anime by Genre. e.g: Fantasy,Action,Drama  etc.

api_list.name: Get Anime by User Rating
api_list.description: Fetch all anime by user rating.

api_list.name: Get Anime by title
api_list.description: Fetch all anime by its title.
